product_name: Monongahela National Forest Hiking Guide - 8th Edition
long_description: Throughout this natural heritage area are numerous hiking trails, all described in the new edition of this comprehensive guide. Authors: Allen de Hart and Bruce Sundquist. Softcover; 356 pages; black-and-white photos and maps. West Virginia Highlands Conservancy; copyright 2006. Features more than 200 maintained hiking trails over 835 miles; features hiking, backpacking and ski touring adventures. Trails are rated for scenery, difficulty, condition, distance, elevation, access points, stream crossings and skiing potential. Includes 75 topographic maps and 58 photos of scenery, flora and fauna. Numerous developed campgrounds and recreation areas. Nearly 700 miles of streams stocked with bass and trout and 1,752 miles of scenic forest roads. Includes 112 miles of the 300-mile Allegheny Trail.
short_description: Throughout this natural heritage area are numerous hiking trails, all described in the new edition of this comprehensive guide.
